dct_description_sm: a Petro Laicstain perlustrata ; et ab eius ore e t schedis à Christiano Schrot in tabulam redacta.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Horae itineris".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Features 2 decorative cartouches with illustrations of biblical events and a pictorial vignette with sailors, ships, and a sea monster.
